revised_title: Influence of Exercise, Food, Medicine, Temperature, and Other Factors on the Quantity of Air Inspired
tldr: The author, Edward Smith, investigates the quantity of air inspired throughout the day and night, and under the influence of exercise, food, medicine, and temperature. Using a spirometer, he records the amount of air inspired during various activities and postures, and analyzes the results to determine the effects of different factors on respiratory rate and volume.
